div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1545 Amrit (anc. Marathus), N. Phoenicia, (650) 1893-1894 Burial: c. 168 B.C. (Noe) Contents: AE Aradus: (yrs. 70-89) Marathus: (yrs. 85-91) Disposition: formerly Rouvier coll. (some) Rouvier, Jour. Asiatique 12 (1898), p. 368 Seyrig, RN 1964, p. 47
